title: (x) Simon logo-similar to Glyphic, Neographik {Grant}
content: It may be custom, but it reminds me a bit of VGC's Glyphic Series and the closest contempory match to that face is Typeco's [Glyphic Neue](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526222039/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typeco/glyphic-neue/medium/testdrive.html?s=simon%20SIMON&p=60). It's not a perfect match, but it's similar in weight and stress.
author: Grant Hutchinson

comments.content:
Here's a larger version of the logo to facilitate the identification...   
   
 ![Simon Logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526222039im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/47946.jpg)   
   
You also may be able to customize the lowercase of Monotype's [Neographik](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526222039/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/neographik-mt/neographik-mt/testdrive.html?s=simon%20SIMON&p=60) to approximate the same look. It's reasonably close.

Anytime.   
   
Sorry that I couldn't nail down the exact typeface for you.
